alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Rock Island, Scott, central Clinton and southwestern Jackson Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Donahue to near Eldridge. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Clinton, Eldridge, DeWitt, Milan, Camanche, Walcott, Buffalo, Andalusia, Princeton, Long Grove, Grand Mound, Delmar, Calamus, Riverdale, Oak Grove, and Donahue. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 286 and 303. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 280 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
